description: This source file defines an authentication service in a .NET backend application. It handles user registration, login, token generation, and retrieval by user ID, utilizing Entity Framework Core for data access, JWT for tokens, and BCrypt for password hashing.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Implements authentication operations such as registration, login, and token generation, conforming to the IAuthService interface.

methods.name: RegisterAsync
methods.description: Registers a new user, hashes their password, saves to database, and returns an authentication response with a JWT token.

methods.name: LoginAsync
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, returning an auth response with a token if successful.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a user entity by its unique identifier.

methods.name: GenerateAuthResponse
methods.description: Generates a JWT token and constructs an authentication response for the given user.
